events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I cannot use what was sent to me.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case based on the mention of wanting their money back for receiving the wrong product.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request efficiently and following up with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’ll do my best to help you with a refund today.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund faster?
Here is my order number 5837201 and attached is the photo showing the wrong product that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the refund process starting so fast and waiting for the return label.
The refund has been processed on our end, and the return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please let us know once you ship the item back.
We wanted to check in and confirm if you have received the return label and if everything is going smoothly with your refund process.
Yes, I received the label and have already shipped the item back. Thanks again for the assistance and excellent service.
Your case is now closed as your refund has been completed successfully. Feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey via email. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
